statements: SELECT * FROM FinancialInstruments;
SELECT instrument_name, instrument_type FROM FinancialInstruments;
SELECT * FROM FinancialInstruments WHERE instrument_type = 'Stock';
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name FROM FinancialInstruments ORDER BY instrument_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM FinancialInstruments WHERE instrument_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM FinancialInstruments
SELECT instrument_name, instrument_type FROM FinancialInstruments
SELECT * FROM FinancialInstruments WHERE instrument_type = 'Stock'
SELECT instrument_name, JSON_VALUE(historical_data, '$.price') AS price FROM FinancialInstruments
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, instrument_type FROM FinancialInstruments ORDER BY instrument_name
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name FROM financial_instruments ORDER BY instrument_id DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE volume > 10000
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name FROM financial_instruments WHERE instrument_name LIKE '%stock%'
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments;
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, instrument_type FROM financial_instruments WHERE instrument_type='Stocks';
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, date, closing_price FROM historical_data WHERE volume > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT MAX(closing_price) AS max_closing_price, MIN(closing_price) AS min_closing_price FROM historical_data;
SELECT instrument_name, AVG(closing_price) AS average_price FROM historical_data GROUP BY instrument_name HAVING AVG(closing_price) > 50;
SELECT * FROM InstrumentData;
SELECT instrument_name, last_price FROM InstrumentData WHERE instrument_id = 1;
SELECT instrument_name, trade_timestamp FROM InstrumentData ORDER BY trade_timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(correlation_coefficient) AS average_correlation FROM CorrelationData WHERE correlation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM TradingStrategy WHERE LENGTH(strategy_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM InstrumentData ORDER BY instrument_id DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, last_price FROM InstrumentData WHERE last_price > 100 ORDER BY last_price ASC;
SELECT instrument_name, trade_timestamp FROM InstrumentData WHERE trade_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND trade_timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY trade_timestamp DESC;
SELECT correlation_id, correlation_coefficient FROM CorrelationData WHERE correlation_coefficient < 0.5 ORDER BY correlation_coefficient ASC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM TradingStrategy WHERE LENGTH(strategy_description) > 50 ORDER BY strategy_id;
SELECT * FROM InstrumentData;
SELECT instrument_name, instrument_type FROM InstrumentData WHERE instrument_id = 1;
SELECT AVG(historical_price) AS avg_price, MAX(historical_price) AS max_price FROM InstrumentData;
SELECT * FROM CorrelationData ORDER BY correlation_value DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM TradingStrategies WHERE strategy_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM InstrumentData ORDER BY instrument_id ASC, instrument_name DESC
SELECT instrument_type, historical_price FROM InstrumentData WHERE historical_price > 100 ORDER BY historical_price DESC
SELECT correlation_value, correlation_date FROM CorrelationData WHERE correlation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY correlation_date ASC, correlation_value DESC
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM TradingStrategies ORDER BY strategy_id
SELECT trade_quantity, trade_date FROM TradeExecution WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY trade_id DESC
SELECT * FROM stock_prices;
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT symbol, volume FROM stock_prices WHERE close_price > open_price ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT symbol1, symbol2, correlation_coefficient FROM stock_correlations WHERE p_value < 0.05;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, performance_metric FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE open_price > 100 ORDER BY close_price ASC
SELECT symbol1, symbol2, correlation_coefficient FROM stock_correlations WHERE p_value < 0.05 ORDER BY correlation_coefficient DESC
SELECT date, symbol, daily_return FROM stock_returns WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM trading_strategies WHERE performance_metric = 'Sharpe Ratio'
